channel.title: CVE Feed for serde -- serde_yaml
channel.description: The latest CVEs for serde -- serde_yaml

item.title: CVE-2019-1010183|2024-08-05T03:07:18.455Z -- serde -- serde_yaml
item.description: serde serde_yaml 0.6.0 to 0.8.3 is affected by: Uncontrolled Recursion. The impact is: Denial of service by aborting. The component is: from_* functions (all deserialization functions). The attack vector is: Parsing a malicious YAML file. The fixed version is: 0.8.4 and later.
